TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit RenderOptions extends System.Object
public ref class RenderOptions abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于控制对象的呈现行为的选项。

span.span: Provides options for controlling the rendering behavior of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用的附加的属性类，以在 WPF 应用程序中指定的文本和可视元素的呈现选项。You can use the attached properties of the class to specify options for the rendering of text and visual elements in your WPF application. 这些选项使您能够优化呈现速度还是注重质量。These options enable you to optimize rendering for speed or quality.

Public Shared Property ProcessRenderMode As RenderMode

summary.span: 指定当前进程的呈现模式首选项。

span.span: Specifies the render mode preference for the current process.

value.span: 当前进程的 首选项。

span.span: The preference for the current process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来强制软件呈现当前进程。Use the property to force software rendering for the current process. 您可以避免许多呈现问题的 WPF 应用程序中发生，并且，由外部问题，如果更改软件呈现到首选项。You can avoid many rendering issues that occur in WPF applications and that are caused by external issues if you change your preference to software rendering. 应用程序在启动期间，如果你的应用程序检测到的呈现问题，例如较慢的帧率可以呈现模式设置为仅软件。During application startup, if your application detects rendering issues, such as slow frame rates, you can set the rendering mode to software only. 此外，你可能想要启用用户设置，该应用程序运行时。Also, you may want to enable the user setting while the application is running. 首选项替代设置。The preference overrides the setting. 软件呈现的优先顺序是：The precedence order for software rendering is: 1. DisableHWAcceleration 注册表项DisableHWAcceleration registry key 2. 3. （每个目标） (per-target) **请注意**指定首选项并不一定更改的实际呈现模式。**Note** specifies a preference and does not necessarily change the actual rendering mode. 系统的其他部分可能会重写此首选项和强制系统使用软件呈现。Other parts of the system may override this preference and force the system into software rendering.

span.span: to set this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法或对位图进行动画处理的后代。Use the method on a or descendant that is animating a bitmap. 对任何位图缩放进行动画处理时，默认高质量图像重采样算法有时可能由于消耗过多系统资源导致帧速率下降，从而导致动画明显变慢。When animating the scale of any bitmap, the default high-quality image re-sampling algorithm can sometimes consume sufficient system resources to cause frame rate degradation, effectively causing animations to stutter. 通过设置的属性对象传递给，缩放位图时，可以创建更为流畅的动画。By setting the property of the object to , you can create a smoother animation when scaling a bitmap. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置为对象。The following example shows how to set the for an object. [!code-csharp[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#renderoptionssnippet2)] [!code-vb[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#renderoptionssnippet2)]

summary.span: 设置指定的依赖对象上的 附加属性值。

span.span: Sets the value of the attached property on a specified dependency object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]不会缓存的已呈现的内容和对象。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在静态方案中，其中内容和场景中的画笔的使用都不会更改，不缓存带来一个好处，因为这可节省视频内存。In static scenarios, where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 当以非静态方法的默认行为使用具有静态内容的画笔[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]重新呈现的画笔的所有内容每一帧，即使内容不变。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way, the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render all the content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，这将会发生时静态或映射到旋转 3D 对象的图面。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新呈现的静态内容可以对性能产生负面影响。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 通过设置附加属性的画笔应用于，可以通过使用缓存的版平铺的画笔对象提高性能。By setting the attached property of the brush to , you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. 并属性值是相对大小值，确定何时应由于比例更改而重新生成对象。The and property values are relative-size values that determine when the object should be regenerated because of changes in scale. 例如，当属性设置为 2.0 中，为缓存需要仅当其大小超出了大小当前缓存的两倍时重新生成。For example, when the property is set to 2.0, the cache for the needs to be regenerated only when its size exceeds two times the size of the current cache. 此方法用于设置附加在代码中的属性。Use this method to set the attached property in code. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用缓存提示选项用于。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a . [!code-csharp[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#renderoptionssnippet3)] [!code-vb[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#renderoptionssnippet3)]

span.span: The specified is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本对象始终显示使用抗锯齿功能，并通过设置边缘模式值不受影响。Text objects are always displayed with anti-aliasing, and are unaffected by setting the edge mode value. 当设置视觉对象的边缘模式值时，视觉对象的所有子代绘图基元设置为相同的边缘模式值。When you set the edge mode value of a visual object, all the descendant drawing primitives of the visual object are set to the same edge mode value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法以设置到视觉对象的边缘模式。The following example shows how to use the method to set the edge mode for a visual object to . [!code-csharp[VisualSnippets#SetEdgeMode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/CSharp/Snippets.cs#setedgemode)] [!code-vb[VisualSnippets#SetEdgeMode](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/visualbasic/snippets.vb#setedgemode)]

span.span: The specified is .
